title: David Gilmour Pink Floyd Live in Gdansk concert 720p
description:
The best concert video I've ever seen is David Gilmour's (guitarist from Pink Floyd) "Live in Gdansk" performance, the final show of his "On An Island" tour. It also happened to be Richard Wright's (keyboardist from Pink Floyd) last concert, since he died shortly afterwards.

I spent MANY hours making my own version of this concert film, cuz I spliced in other songs that were not included in the official DVD release, and I manually typed out English captions for the song lyrics, so that people could sing along and/or appreciate the poetry of the lyrics.

Video Length: 2:44:28
Video Resolution: 1280x720
Audio: 317 kbps
ENGLISH LYRICS CAPTIONS HARDCODED
